title: Number of TV ads seen daily per person in the United Kingdom ( UK ) 2008 to 2015
summary: Overall Advertisements seen has increased over the Year.
Advertisements seen is slightly increasing from 2010 to 2011, and lastly roughly constant from 2011 to 2013.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2010 and 2011.
Maximum Advertisements seen, about 47.0 was reported at Year 2011,  2012, and 2013
Minimum Advertisements seen about 46.0 was reached at Year 2010
min_summary: Overall Advertisements seen has increased over the Year.
Advertisements seen is slightly increasing from 2010 to 2011, and lastly roughly constant from 2011 to 2013.
mid_summary: Overall Advertisements seen has increased over the Year.
Advertisements seen is slightly increasing from 2010 to 2011, and lastly roughly constant from 2011 to 2013.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2010 and 2011.

max_summary: In general Advertisements seen has stayed the same over the Year.
Advertisements seen is slightly increasing from 2010 to 2011, and lastly roughly constant from 2011 to 2013.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2010 and 2011.
Maximum Advertisements seen, about 47.0 was reported at Year 2011,  2012, and 2013
Minimum Advertisements seen about 46.0 was reached at Year 2010
